description:
Saito sets a trap for Samurai X by enlisting another assassin in his plan. And once Kenshin repels the accomplice, he`s left to take on his old rival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geçmişten Gelen Güçlü Rakip: Acımasız Dişlerin Saldırısı!
Shijou Saikyou no Shukuteki! Osoikakaru Hijou no Kiba
The Strongest Opponent From the Past
ศัตรูผู้แข็งเกร่งหมาป่าอหังการ์
史上最強の宿敵! 襲いかかる非情の牙
